titleStmt.title: The Duke de Mayennes ghost speaking to the princes, lords, and gentlemen of France. Faithfully translated according to the French copie.

publicationStmt.publisher: by Hillebrant Iacobson, Printer to the Generall States of the vnited Netherlands.,

notesStmt.note: Imperfect: stained, and with print show-through, and loss of text.
